New Records: New Zealand's 89-run win is their biggest margin of victory over Australia in a T20 World Cup match
Key Match Events: New Zealand's total of 200/3, Australia's collapse to 111 all out, Trent Boult's hat-trick, Mitchell Starc's wicket
Post-Match Reflections: Stuart Clark's comments on Australia's performance, Andrew Moore's praise for New Zealand's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Perth, Australia, New Zealand's win was a massive one, Trent Boult's knuckle ball was effective
Others: The match was part of the T20 World Cup, Australia had to travel to Perth to play Sri Lanka after the match
